about_the_game:
Uncover Ancient Ruins on Frog Island!

Relaxing, cozy casual adventure where your quest is to explore and create a map of the mysterious island. Take a short hike through a magical forest full of frogs and relics from an ancient civilization that worshipped frogs and built large frog statues!

Hand crafted magical island!

Take a cozy hike and enjoy the scenery! Unlock the path to four distinctive parts of the Frog Island.

Relaxing Adventure in a Mystical World!

Lore of the Frog is a fully positive experience aimed to be a relaxing and cozy casual adventure to lift your mood. The full experience takes between 1,5-2 hours to complete.

  • Solve casual puzzles to unlock the path through the island
  • Explore and make a map of the Frog Island
  • Put hats on frogs!
  • Uncover ancient frog ruins
  • Enjoy a relaxing atmosphere & music
  • Fill your journal with stickers
  • Put hats on frogs!

name: Lore of the Frog

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-10100F
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, 6 GB or AMD Radeon RX 590, 8 GB, or Intel Arc A750, 8 GB
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-12400F
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660s, 6 GB or AMD Radeon RX 590, 8 GB
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: First person cozy walking simulator. You are a frog archaeologist on a journey to the elusive Frog island. Cozy hiking adventure in a magical forest with casual puzzles, ancient frog statues... And put hats on frogs!
